properties.sql:
MERGE INTO
  `${ProjectID}.${TargetDatasetName}.supplier_dimension` tgt
USING
  (
  SELECT
    sm.vendors_account_number as vendors_account_number_join_key,
    sm.vendor_account_group as vendor_account_group_join_key,
    sm.industry_key as industry_key_join_key,
    sm.country_key as country_key_join_key,
    sm.postal_code as postal_code_join_key,
    sm.region as region_join_key,
    sm.plant as plant_join_key,
    sm.vendors_account_number,
    sm.vendor_account_group,
    sm.industry_key,
    sm.country_key,
    sm.postal_code,
    sm.region,
    sm.plant,
    sm.title,
    sm.train_station,
    sm.international_location_number_1,
    sm.international_location_number_2,
    sm.authorization_group,
    sm.check_digit,
    sm.data_line,
    sm.date_medium_exchange_indicator,
    sm.instruction_key,
    sm.created_on,
    sm.created_by,
    sm.isr_subscriber_number,
    sm.group_key,
    sm.customer_number,
    sm.alternative_payee,
    sm.central_deletion_flag,
    sm.name_1,
    sm.name_2,
    sm.name_3,
    sm.name_4,
    sm.city,
    sm.district,
    sm.post_office_box,
    sm.po_box_postal_code,
    sm.sort_field,
    sm.central_posting_block,
    sm.central_purchasing_block,
    sm.language_key,
    sm.tax_number_1,
    sm.tax_number_2,
    sm.tax_number_3,
    sm.sales_equalization_tax,
    sm.liable_for_vat,
    sm.street_and_house_number,
    sm.telebox_number,
    sm.telephone_1,
    sm.telephone_2,
    sm.fax_number,
    sm.teletex_number,
    sm.telex_number,
    sm.one_time_account,
    sm.payee_in_document,
    sm.trading_partner,
    sm.fiscal_address,
    sm.vat_registration_number,
    sm.natural_person,
    sm.block_function,
    sm.matchcode_name_1,
    sm.matchcode_name_2,
    sm.matchcode_city,
    sm.place_of_birth,
    sm.date_of_birth,
    sm.sex,
    sm.credit_information_number,
    sm.last_external_review,
    sm.actual_qm_system,
    sm.reference_account_group,
    sm.post_office_box_city,
    sm.vendor_sub_range_relevant,
    sm.plant_level_relevant,
    sm.factory_calendar,
    sm.tax_jurisdiction,
    sm.payment_block,
    sm.address,
    sm.tax_number_4,
    sm.tax_number_5,
    sm.dw_last_update_date as input_last_update_date,
    sm.dw_active_indicator
  FROM `${ProjectID}.${StagingDatasetName}.supply_master` sm
       INNER JOIN `${ProjectID}.${StagingDatasetName}.layer1_audit_table` lat
    ON 1 = 1
   AND lat.table_name = 'supplier_dimension' 
 WHERE sm.dw_active_indicator = 'Y'
   AND (sm.dw_last_update_date >= CASE WHEN lat.full_delta_indicator = 'F' THEN lat.full_load_datetime
                                        WHEN lat.full_delta_indicator <> 'F' THEN lat.delta_load_datetime
                                        ELSE CAST('1900-01-01T00:00:00' AS DATETIME)
                                   END)
UNION ALL 
  SELECT
    sm.vendors_account_number as vendors_account_number_join_key,
    sm.vendor_account_group as vendor_account_group_join_key,
    sm.industry_key as industry_key_join_key,
    sm.country_key as country_key_join_key,
    sm.postal_code as postal_code_join_key,
    sm.region as region_join_key,
    sm.plant as plant_join_key,
    sm.vendors_account_number,
    sm.vendor_account_group,
    sm.industry_key,
    sm.country_key,
    sm.postal_code,
    sm.region,
    sm.plant,
    sm.title,
    sm.train_station,
    sm.international_location_number_1,
    sm.international_location_number_2,
    sm.authorization_group,
    sm.check_digit,
    sm.data_line,
    sm.date_medium_exchange_indicator,
    sm.instruction_key,
    sm.created_on,
    sm.created_by,
    sm.isr_subscriber_number,
    sm.group_key,
    sm.customer_number,
    sm.alternative_payee,
    sm.central_deletion_flag,
    sm.name_1,
    sm.name_2,
    sm.name_3,
    sm.name_4,
    sm.city,
    sm.district,
    sm.post_office_box,
    sm.po_box_postal_code,
    sm.sort_field,
    sm.central_posting_block,
    sm.central_purchasing_block,
    sm.language_key,
    sm.tax_number_1,
    sm.tax_number_2,
    sm.tax_number_3,
    sm.sales_equalization_tax,
    sm.liable_for_vat,
    sm.street_and_house_number,
    sm.telebox_number,
    sm.telephone_1,
    sm.telephone_2,
    sm.fax_number,
    sm.teletex_number,
    sm.telex_number,
    sm.one_time_account,
    sm.payee_in_document,
    sm.trading_partner,
    sm.fiscal_address,
    sm.vat_registration_number,
    sm.natural_person,
    sm.block_function,
    sm.matchcode_name_1,
    sm.matchcode_name_2,
    sm.matchcode_city,
    sm.place_of_birth,
    sm.date_of_birth,
    sm.sex,
    sm.credit_information_number,
    sm.last_external_review,
    sm.actual_qm_system,
    sm.reference_account_group,
    sm.post_office_box_city,
    sm.vendor_sub_range_relevant,
    sm.plant_level_relevant,
    sm.factory_calendar,
    sm.tax_jurisdiction,
    sm.payment_block,
    sm.address,
    sm.tax_number_4,
    sm.tax_number_5,
    sm.dw_last_update_date as input_last_update_date,
    sm.dw_active_indicator
  FROM `${ProjectID}.${StagingDatasetName}.supply_master` sm
       INNER JOIN `${ProjectID}.${TargetDatasetName}.supplier_dimension` sd 
    ON sd.vendors_account_number = sm.vendors_account_number
   AND sd.vendor_account_group = sm.vendor_account_group
   AND sd.industry_key = sm.industry_key
   AND sd.country_key = sm.country_key
   AND sd.postal_code = sm.postal_code
   AND sd.region = sm.region
   AND sd.plant = sm.plant
   AND sd.dw_active_indicator = 'Y'
       INNER JOIN `${ProjectID}.${StagingDatasetName}.layer1_audit_table` lat
    ON 1 = 1
   AND lat.table_name = 'supplier_dimension' 
 WHERE sm.dw_active_indicator = 'Y'
   AND (sm.dw_last_update_date >= CASE WHEN lat.full_delta_indicator = 'F' THEN lat.full_load_datetime
                                        WHEN lat.full_delta_indicator <> 'F' THEN lat.delta_load_datetime
                                        ELSE CAST('1900-01-01T00:00:00' AS DATETIME)
                                   END)) scr 
    ON tgt.vendors_account_number = scr.vendors_account_number
   AND tgt.vendor_account_group = scr.vendor_account_group
   AND tgt.industry_key = scr.industry_key
   AND tgt.country_key = scr.country_key
   AND tgt.postal_code = scr.postal_code
   AND tgt.region = scr.region
   AND tgt.plant = scr.plant
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE set tgt.dw_end_date = CURRENT_DATETIME()
          ,tgt.dw_active_indicator = 'N'
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN 
INSERT (
supplier_uuid,
vendors_account_number,
vendor_account_group,
industry_key,
country_key,
postal_code,
region,
plant,
title,
train_station,
international_location_number_1,
international_location_number_2,
authorization_group,
check_digit,
data_line,
date_medium_exchange_indicator,
instruction_key,
created_on,
created_by,
isr_subscriber_number,
group_key,
customer_number,
alternative_payee,
central_deletion_flag,
name_1,
name_2,
name_3,
name_4,
city,
district,
post_office_box,
po_box_postal_code,
sort_field,
central_posting_block,
central_purchasing_block,
language_key,
tax_number_1,
tax_number_2,
tax_number_3,
sales_equalization_tax,
liable_for_vat,
street_and_house_number,
telebox_number,
telephone_1,
telephone_2,
fax_number,
teletex_number,
telex_number,
one_time_account,
payee_in_document,
trading_partner,
fiscal_address,
vat_registration_number,
natural_person,
block_function,
matchcode_name_1,
matchcode_name_2,
matchcode_city,
place_of_birth,
date_of_birth,
sex,
credit_information_number,
last_external_review,
actual_qm_system,
reference_account_group,
post_office_box_city,
vendor_sub_range_relevant,
plant_level_relevant,
factory_calendar,
tax_jurisdiction,
payment_block,
address,
tax_number_4,
tax_number_5,
input_last_update_date,
dw_active_indicator,
dw_start_date,
dw_end_date,
dw_last_update_date)
VALUES 
(GENERATE_UUID(),
scr.vendors_account_number,
scr.vendor_account_group,
scr.industry_key,
scr.country_key,
scr.postal_code,
scr.region,
scr.plant,
scr.title,
scr.train_station,
scr.international_location_number_1,
scr.international_location_number_2,
scr.authorization_group,
scr.check_digit,
scr.data_line,
scr.date_medium_exchange_indicator,
scr.instruction_key,
scr.created_on,
scr.created_by,
scr.isr_subscriber_number,
scr.group_key,
scr.customer_number,
scr.alternative_payee,
scr.central_deletion_flag,
scr.name_1,
scr.name_2,
scr.name_3,
scr.name_4,
scr.city,
scr.district,
scr.post_office_box,
scr.po_box_postal_code,
scr.sort_field,
scr.central_posting_block,
scr.central_purchasing_block,
scr.language_key,
scr.tax_number_1,
scr.tax_number_2,
scr.tax_number_3,
scr.sales_equalization_tax,
scr.liable_for_vat,
scr.street_and_house_number,
scr.telebox_number,
scr.telephone_1,
scr.telephone_2,
scr.fax_number,
scr.teletex_number,
scr.telex_number,
scr.one_time_account,
scr.payee_in_document,
scr.trading_partner,
scr.fiscal_address,
scr.vat_registration_number,
scr.natural_person,
scr.block_function,
scr.matchcode_name_1,
scr.matchcode_name_2,
scr.matchcode_city,
scr.place_of_birth,
scr.date_of_birth,
scr.sex,
scr.credit_information_number,
scr.last_external_review,
scr.actual_qm_system,
scr.reference_account_group,
scr.post_office_box_city,
scr.vendor_sub_range_relevant,
scr.plant_level_relevant,
scr.factory_calendar,
scr.tax_jurisdiction,
scr.payment_block,
scr.address,
scr.tax_number_4,
scr.tax_number_5,
scr.input_last_update_date,
scr.dw_active_indicator,
CURRENT_DATETIME(),
DATETIME(9999, 12, 31, 23, 59, 59),
CURRENT_DATETIME());

MERGE INTO 
`${ProjectID}.${StagingDatasetName}.layer1_audit_table` tgt
USING ( SELECT 
         'supplier_dimension' as table_name
         ,CASE WHEN (select full_delta_indicator from `${ProjectID}.${StagingDatasetName}.layer1_audit_table` where table_name = 'supplier_dimension') IS NULL
                    OR (select full_delta_indicator from `${ProjectID}.${StagingDatasetName}.layer1_audit_table` where table_name = 'supplier_dimension') = 'F'
               THEN 'F'
               ELSE 'D'
          END AS full_delta_indicator
        ,'0VENDOR_ATTR,0BP_DEF_ADDRESS_ATTR' as extractors_names
        ,CAST('1900-01-01T00:00:00' AS DATETIME) as full_load_datetime
        ,(select max(input_last_update_date) as delta_load_datatime from `${ProjectID}.${TargetDatasetName}.supplier_dimension`) as delta_load_datetime
        ,(select COUNT(*) AS inserted_record_count from `${ProjectID}.${TargetDatasetName}.supplier_dimension` a inner join `${ProjectID}.${StagingDatasetName}.layer1_audit_table` b
          on 1 = 1 where b.table_name = 'supplier_dimension' and  a.dw_last_update_date > CASE WHEN b.full_delta_indicator = 'F' 
                                                                                               THEN b.full_load_datetime
                                                                                               ELSE b.delta_load_datetime
                                                                                          END
          and a.dw_active_indicator = 'Y') AS inserted_record_count
        ,CURRENT_DATETIME() as last_update_date
) scr
on tgt.table_name = scr.table_name
WHEN MATCHED THEN 
UPDATE set tgt.full_load_datetime ='1900-01-01T00:00:00'
          ,tgt.delta_load_datetime = scr.delta_load_datetime
          ,tgt.inserted_record_count = scr.inserted_record_count
          ,tgt.last_update_date = scr.last_update_date
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT (table_name,
        full_delta_indicator,
        extractors_names,
        full_load_datetime,
        delta_load_datetime,
        inserted_record_count,
        last_update_date)
VALUES(scr.table_name,
       scr.full_delta_indicator,
       scr.extractors_names,
       scr.full_load_datetime,
       scr.delta_load_datetime,
       scr.inserted_record_count,
       scr.last_update_date);
